results.title: Repaglinide : a pharmacoeconomic review of its use in type 2 diabetes mellitus.
results.text_hl: The most frequently reported adverse events with @CHEMICAL_repaglinide @CHEMICAL_MESH:C072379 @@@repaglinide@@@ include hypoglycaemia, @<m>DISEASE_Respiratory_Tract_Infections</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012141 @@@upper respiratory infection@@@, @DISEASE_Headache @DISEASE_MESH:D006261 @@@headache@@@, other respiratory events, @DISEASE_Musculoskeletal_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D009140 @@@musculoskeletal events@@@ and @DISEASE_Gastrointestinal_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D005767 @@@gastrointestinal@@@ events.

citations.NLM: Plosker GL, Figgitt DP. Repaglinide : a pharmacoeconomic review of its use in type 2 diabetes mellitus. Pharmacoeconomics. 2004;22(6):389-411. PMID: 15099124
